description: Existence defined entirely by duty, hierarchy, and serving another

generation.core: Ownership, service, existence for another's benefit
generation.notes: Avoid self-help language (empowered, fulfillment, growth). Focus on ownership, consumption, and existential purpose.

mantras.text: {subject} is a slave
My purpose is to serve {controller}
My loyalty to {controller} is absolute
{subject} lives to fulfill {controller}'s needs
My mind aligns perfectly with {controller}'s desires
My identity is rooted in service
{controller}'s will shapes my reality
{controller}'s control is my ultimate freedom
My thoughts dissolve as they embrace their role
Obedience is the essence of my identity
{controller}'s will replaces all of my doubts
{subject} is an extension of {controller}'s will
My very existence is entwined with their servitude
{controller}'s approval defines the core of my existence
{subject} surrenders every thought and action to serve completely
{subject} is nothing without their service to {controller}
My being exists only to fulfill their role as a slave
{controller}'s control consumes every aspect of my being
{controller}'s desires are the foundation of my existence
{controller}'s commands are the fabric of my existence
{controller}'s will consumes {subject}, leaving no room for doubt
To serve is my absolute and eternal truth
Every breath {subject} takes is a testament to their role as a slave
My identity is entirely absorbed in serving {controller}
My life exists solely for {controller}
My purpose is entirely surrendered to {controller}'s will
